searchingSoldierStep(SimulationController) - Method in class Commando
Step calculation for searching commando Find closest zombie and tries to shoot it If no closest zombie is present, moves to next position and again tries to find a closest zombie and shoot it

shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController) - Method in class Commando
Step calculation for shooting commando Creates bullet, Try to find another zombie while in the shooting state If no closest zombie is present, change random direction and search for another zombie
shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController) - Method in class RegularSoldier
Step calculation for shooting soldier Creates bullet, If closest zombie, change state to aiming, If not, pick random direction and change state to searching
shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController) - Method in class Sniper
Step calculation for shooting soldier Creates bullet, Try to find another zombie while in the shooting state.
shootingSoldierStep(SimulationController) - Method in class Soldier
Abstract shooting soldier step Called in step method of the soldier
SimulationController - Class in <Unnamed>
Simulation controller class To step a simulation, I have 4 different arrays, namely soldiers, zombies, activeBullets and nextTurnBullets

step(SimulationController) - Method in class Zombie
Zombie step This method will be called every time a zombie calls step method Later, the specialized wandering or following zombie step methods will be called inside this method.
stepAll() - Method in class SimulationController
Loops infinitely until all soldiers or all zombies are dead Loops with zombie, bullet, soldier order.
